name: flow-calculation-tool
description: 长沙院浆体管道计算工具

scripts.dist:win: npm install && python scripts/convert-license-to-gbk.py && node scripts/clean.js && node scripts/build-frontend.js && node scripts/verify-frontend-dist.js && node scripts/clean.js release && npx electron-builder --win
scripts.dist:win:full: npm run build:python && npm run dist:win
scripts.dist:win:legacy: npm install && python scripts/convert-license-to-gbk.py && node scripts/clean.js && node scripts/build-frontend.js && node scripts/verify-frontend-dist.js && node scripts/clean.js release-win7 && node scripts/build-win7.js
scripts.dist:win:both: npm run dist:win:full && npm run dist:win:legacy
scripts.dist:mac: node scripts/build-frontend.js && node scripts/verify-frontend-dist.js && node scripts/clean.js release && npx electron-builder --mac
scripts.dist:linux: node scripts/build-frontend.js && node scripts/verify-frontend-dist.js && node scripts/clean.js release && npx electron-builder --linux
scripts.pack: node scripts/build-frontend.js && node scripts/verify-frontend-dist.js && npx electron-builder --dir
